question:

options: was the chairman of the occasion

question:

question:

question:

question:

the bank manager is unwilling to grant Nosa any loan

question:

has not built a house though he earns a handsome salary
will spend all the money he earns if he wants to build a house
wants to buld a house but he has not earned sufficient money

question:

gave up the struggle because he did not have enough courage

question:

question:

be in Ibadan untill the end of December
be in Port Harcourt this December
move to Port Harcourt after this December
